name: CreateTaskTicktick
description:
Create a new task in Ticktick with specified properties.

Use this tool to create a new task in Ticktick by specifying title, content, dates, reminders, subtasks, and the project it belongs to.

parameters.name: task_details_json
parameters.description: A JSON object containing task properties such as title, projectId, content, subtasks, dates, reminders, etc.

title.description: Task title - the name or summary of the task (required)

projectId.description: Project id - the project where this task will be created (required)

content.description: Task content - additional details or description

desc.description: Description of checklist - detailed description for checklist tasks

isAllDay.description: All day flag - set to true for all-day tasks

startDate.description: Start date and time in 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ' format

dueDate.description: Due date and time in 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ' format

timeZone.description: The time zone in which the time is specified

reminders.description: Lists of reminders specific to the task

repeatFlag.description: Recurring rules of task in RRULE format

priority.description: The priority of task - default is 0 (None: 0, Low: 1, Medium: 3, High: 5)

startDate.description: Start date and time in 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ' format

timeZone.description: The time zone in which the Start time is specified

status.description: The completion status of subtask - Normal: 0, Completed: 1

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ticktick API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
